desc: We make eco-friendly, sustainable surfwear for Women, Men & Kids, in bold, small-batch, limited edition prints. Our Board Shorts are made from Recycled Plastic Bottles, and our Beach Clothes & Gear are ethically-made from sustainable fabrics & techniques. A West Australian, ethical, independent family business.

layout.text: Boardies Made From Recycled Plastic Bottles. Limited Edition Prints.
